name: Infomega Technologies
overview:
Infomega Technologies is a Next Technology IT Consulting Firm specializing in cutting edge business solutions utilizing Enterprise Business Solutions, Web 2.0, SOA, Open Source, Mobile application development, SAP and many more.

We are leading a new Technology of India-based IT experts who combine an intimate knowledge of todayâ€™s cutting edge technologies with the business savvy needed to create and build strategic technology infrastructure and applications.

With more than 300+ clients and 1000+ projects in Mobile, Open source, Web 2.0, and SOA under our belt, Infomega enables large and SME companies alike to leverage our one-of-a kind workforce of elite IT experts to create revenue generating business solutions.

Infomega has quickly established strong footholds in fields of Offshore Dedicated Development Center, Application Development & Maintenance, Software as a Service, Enterprise Solutions, Product Development & Support, Game Development, Mobile Solutions, Testing Services, Multimedia Services and Search Engine Optimization.
